segments.text: Over near the cabinets, there's a different kind of drama playing out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A young boy is precariously balanced on a small stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's clearly aiming for the cookie jar in the open upper cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His arm is stretched out, and I see his hand reaching inside the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Another child, a girl, is standing below him, eagerly looking up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has her hand raised, almost as if silently asking for a share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's quite a coordinated effort they have going on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are definitely sneaking those cookies without permission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm a little worried about that stool; it looks very unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's tilted back, and those legs are splayed outwards.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't fall and hurt himself trying to get a treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But I have to admit, their stealth is pretty good for their age.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They certainly seem determined to get their hands on those sweets.
segments.speaker: PAR
